Module com.github.sormuras.bach
Package com.github.sormuras.bach

Annotation Interface ProjectInfo.Options

Enclosing class:
ProjectInfo
@Target({}) public static @interface ProjectInfo.Options
An options configuration.

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    int
    compileModulesForJavaRelease
    Returns the Java version (release feature number) to compile main modules for.
    CodeStyle
    formatSourceFilesWithCodeStyle
    Returns the style to format Java source-code files with, defaults to CodeStyle.FREE.
    boolean
    includeSourceFilesIntoModules
    Returns true in order to include all files found in source folders into their modules.
    ProjectInfo.Launcher
    launcher
    Returns the launcher option value for the custom runtime image generated by jlink.
    ProjectInfo.Tools
    tools
    Returns the tools-releated settings.

  • Element Details

    • compileModulesForJavaRelease

      int compileModulesForJavaRelease
      Returns the Java version (release feature number) to compile main modules for.

      For a value of 0, the default value, the --release option is omitted.

      Returns:
      the Java version (release feature number) to compile main modules for
      See Also:
      Property.PROJECT_TARGETS_JAVA
      Default:
      0

    • formatSourceFilesWithCodeStyle

      CodeStyle formatSourceFilesWithCodeStyle
      Returns the style to format Java source-code files with, defaults to CodeStyle.FREE.
      Returns:
      the style to format Java source-code files with, defaults to CodeStyle.FREE
      See Also:
      Project.spaces()
      Default:
      FREE

    • includeSourceFilesIntoModules

      boolean includeSourceFilesIntoModules
      Returns true in order to include all files found in source folders into their modules.
      Returns:
      true in order to include all files found in source folders into their modules
      See Also:
      Flag.JAR_WITH_SOURCES
      Default:
      false

    • launcher

      ProjectInfo.Launcher launcher
      Returns the launcher option value for the custom runtime image generated by jlink.

      Defaults to "*" which triggers auto-detection of the value based on this project's name and a unique main module providing a main class.

      Returns:
      the launcher option value for the custom runtime image generated by jlink
      Default:
      @com.github.sormuras.bach.ProjectInfo.Launcher(module="*")

    • tools

      ProjectInfo.Tools tools
      Returns the tools-releated settings.
      Returns:
      the tools-releated settings
      Default:
      @com.github.sormuras.bach.ProjectInfo.Tools
